WEDDINGS

Newly renovated, our multiple venues feature fresh design schemes, gourmet catering, and high-end amenities. We specialize in your most intimate events, including weddings, rehearsal dinners, bridal showers and even bachelor and bachelorette parties!Not sure where to spend your special night? Stay in one of our classic Honeymoon suites for the most romantic and memorable evening. Our professional staff will assist you in customizing the perfect package for your celebration.

THE BOARD ROOM

10 Executive Seats, rich leather, walnut paneling and our best whiskey at your private bar. Includes wireless internet and flat screen for presentations. Get down to business, get the deal done, then close the laptop, plug in the iTunes and pour it.

THE STAMPEDE ROOM

Bring the whole company. 80 seats, full bar, breakfast, lunch or dinner. Full multimedia available.

THE FOX ROOM

Seating for 35. Have an executive retreat? Do you need to get the kin together? This rooms works great for both!

THE FIRESIDE ROOM

Small and compact, but powerful. Some day you will need our biggest room, but for now you will fill our smallest. Enjoy seating for 25 as we take care of all your meeting and dining needs.
